open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Kaalfontein, Tembisa & Hospital view
open.description: Vumatel Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Kaalfontein, Tembisa & Hospital view, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
